column5: Our place is close to restaurants and dining and family-friendly activities. Youâ€™ll love our place because of the proximity to the Texas A&M campus, the ambiance, the neighborhood, the outdoors space, and the people. Our place is good for couples, business travelers, and families (with kids). The guest bedroom has a queen bed, the second room has a twin bed. It also has a lovely backdoor full of plants and large patio.
column8: Modern Tuscan-style house 8 miles from Texas A&M
